com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.decommission

Class TriggerDecommissionStep

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Element, Interruptible, Step

    public class TriggerDecommissionStep
extends UninstallStep
    Step which marks a task as being decommissioned and kills it.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Description copied from interface: Step
        Starts the Step, whose Status should be Status.PENDING. This will continue to be called for as long as Element.isPending() returns true. See #updateOfferStatus(Collection<org.apache.mesos.Protos.Offer.Operation>) which returns the outcome of the PodInstanceRequirement
